pages.title: Apprentice Spells
pages.text: A compendium of all the spells the basic wand can cast.

pages.title: Bubble Leviosa
pages.text: Trap and levitate your target inside a bubble. Also, it heals them a bit.

pages.title: Self Bubble Leviosa I
pages.text: Pressing $(k:turtlemancy.selfbubble) you can get Bubble Leviosa applied to yourself.

pages.title: Turtles Defense
pages.text: Use the wand while sneaking to get $(thing)Resistance I$() at the cost of getting $(thing)Slowness I$().

pages.title: Chicken Burst
pages.text: Use the wand against a chicken to make it explode. Yeah. Turtles hate chickens. Why? I don't know. Maybe becouse they are fast, light and cowards. Explode chickens and get a lot (and I mean a lot) of feathers.

pages.title: Instant Pearl
pages.text: Use the wand against an Oyster Sand block to get the pearl.

pages.title: Kelp Collector
pages.text: Use the wand against kelp to get it it in massive ammounts.

pages.title: Egg Picker
pages.text: Use the wand against a turttle egg (or on a magmatic turtle egg) to pick it without silky touch.$(br2)If there are multiple eggs you will only pick one at a time.

pages.title: Seagrass Collector
pages.text: Use the wand against seagrass to get it it massive ammounts.
